title: Excellent handyman
copy: It's the second time I have called Paulo. He is always punchtual, his work excellent, always goes the extra mile and nothing is too much trouble. Very tidy and I wouldn't hesitate to refer Paulo to family and friends. I'll be ringing him again in the near future. thanks Paulo.

title: Very good and helpful
copy: On of the best handy men companies to work with. And very competitive in the market. Paulo was great and very helpful from day 1 and did an amazing job. Thank you very much. Totally recommended.

title: Quick and efficient service
copy: The washers in our taps had broken and the taps wouldn't stop running. We couldn't undo the taps ourselves as they were too tight. Paulo fixed it easily and quickly.

title: Totally would use again!
copy: Excellent service. Paulo installed the laminating floor at our new apartment and we are really happy with the results. He was efficient and attentive, and  also helped us assembling the new Ikea furniture. Totally would use again!
